com.intercom.media

类 VideoCaptureAndroid

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.intercom.media.VideoCapture
      • com.intercom.media.VideoCaptureCamera
        • com.intercom.media.VideoCaptureAndroid
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    android.hardware.Camera.PreviewCallback

    public class VideoCaptureAndroid
extends VideoCaptureCamera
    This class extends the VideoCaptureCamera base class for manipulating normal video capture devices in Android, including receiving copies of preview frames via Java-allocated buffers. It also includes class BuggyDeviceHack to deal with troublesome devices.

    • 字段概要
